title: Homeowners transform their garages into stunning living spaces - from a games room to a wine cellar
text:
Proud homeowners who transformed their garages into stylish living spaces have taken to Instagram to show off the impressive results.

Many opted to renovate their old car storage rooms to add an additional living room to their properties, while others indulged in a luxurious extra asset such as a games room and wine cellar.

One Yorkshire-based Instagram user, who regularly shares snaps of their glamorous home under the handle @no14hectorshouse, revealed their garage is now a chic country kitchen with bifolding doors onto a patio.

Here FEMAIL takes a look at some of the most impressive garage conversions - and they're bound to get you thinking about how you can transform your own...

‹ Slide me › A Yorkshire-based Instagram user, who regularly shares snaps of their glamorous home under the handle @no14hectorshouse, shared impressive before and after images of their garage conversion

‹ Slide me › Another before and after shot from @no14hectorshouse shows how the garage is now a stylish kitchen and garden room, which opens out onto a patio

‹ Slide me › This homeowner in Essex, who posts under the handle @our_eft_home, recently shared images of their garage which has been converted into a sleek games room and bar

‹ Slide me › This garage in Perth, Australia, was given a radical makeover, transformed from a dingy store room to a magnificent wine cellar complete with stone cladding and an authentic barrel table

‹ Slide me › Instagram user @makingahouseahome_69, from Hampshire, unveiled their cool garage transformation, which saw them turn it into an extra living room

‹ Slide me › This Instagram user from Makerfield, England shared their home renovation snaps under the handle @ourbungalow_renovation, showing how they transformed their garage into a cosy bedroom

This garage was transformed into a contemporary living space and kitchen, complete with a hanging chair, by a Buckinghamshire-based architecture firm

This Maryland garage has been turned into an artist's studio and gallery perfect for showing off their finest work

Shared by UK-based Instagram user @garageflex, this shows how a disused garage can be transformed into an upmarket home gym space

This stunning garage conversion shows how much you can fit into a small space with a good design. The image was shared by California-based Instagram user @moneyspacenow

Wine lovers will be swooning over this clever garage conversion, which is now a glamorous wine cellar and storage room - designed by US-based Instagram user @andeethedesignerbuilder

A beautician based in Suffolk transformed her small garage into a brand new treatment room

This Pennsylvania-based couple transformed their garage into a home office which they describe as a 'haven' thanks to its bifolding doors
description: Proud homeowners from across the globe who transformed their tired old garages into stylish new living spaces have taken to Instagram to show off the very impressive results.
